snippet.title: The Long Drive Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Long Drive - Home-made random generated open world semi-post apocalyptic survival car driving game!

Steam Page: https://bit.ly/2mdBGj5
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thelongdrivegame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/the_long_drive_official/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/genesz
Discord: https://discord.gg/CvaxNWD
Email: thedrivevideogame@gmail.com

Short summary:

In 1979, something has happened to the world. Your mom left you before the apocalypse, and now you find a letter in the mailbox.

It's your mother. She wants to see you. But she lives 5000 kilometers (~3000) miles away, fuel and other resources are scarce..Can you complete the journey?
